mapper.sql: staff_id, staff_account, staff_password, staff_name, staff_role_id, staff_dept_id, staff_is_status, staff_is_deleted, staff_email, staff_avatar
mapper.select: select staff_id, staff_account, staff_name, staff_role_id, staff_dept_id, staff_is_status, staff_is_deleted, staff_email, staff_avatar, role_name, dept_name from staff join healthsystem.role r on r.role_id = staff.staff_role_id join healthsystem.department d on staff.staff_dept_id = d.dept_id
mapper.insert: insert into staff(staff_name, staff_account, staff_email, staff_password, staff_dept_id, staff_role_id) value (#{staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{staffRoleId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update staff
staff_name = #{updated.staffName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staff_role_id = #{updated.staffRoleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staff_dept_id = #{updated.staffDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staff_is_status = #{updated.staffIsStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staff_is_deleted = #{updated.staffIsDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
staff_email = #{updated.staffEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where staff_id=#{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
